General.Name: Shenzhen Bioeasy Biotechnology Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Shenzhen Bioeasy Biotechnology Co., Ltd. develops and sells rapid testing instruments and reagents in China. The company offers detection equipment for use in the fields of food, agricultural, dairy, meat, aquatic, honey, drug, and public safety, as well as clinical diagnosis. Shenzhen Bioeasy Biotechnology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2007 and is based in Shenzhen, China.
General.Address: Room 101, Yirui Biological Building, Shenzhen, China, 518101
